resources.string: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Couldn\'t connect to the server. Please try again.
Could not fetch the required datas. Please contact your service provider!!!
Your user id has not been registered into our system.\nPlease sign up first to use our services.
Your account has not been activated yet.\nPlease contact your service provider to resolve this issue.
Your user account has not been approved .Please contact your service provider.
Your device has not been registered into our system.\nPlease contact your service provider and register device mac address to use our services

You have successfully registered to our system. Please check your email and click the activation link to complete your registration. \\n\\nYou can login to the system only after our team reviews your request once your have activated your account. This process might take time so you are requested to wait our email confirmation of your Registration approval.\\nIf you did not receive any email or face any other issue regarding registration process, please email us at info@artemisiaiofcaria.com
AndroidTV LiveTV needs an access to your Extenal Storage.
A new version of AndroidTV LiveTV is available.\n Download Now.

You have successfully registered to our system. Please check your email and click the activation link to complete your registration. 

You can login to the system only after our team reviews your request once your have activated your account. This process might take time so you are requested to wait our email confirmation of your Registration approval.
If you did not receive any email or face any other issue regarding registration process, please email us at support@totalcable.c
Sorry, no channels found for this category
Could not fetch the required datas. Please re-login
Sorry you do not have access to any channels. Please buy channels From MyAccount App.
is already logged in - \nPlease Exit to Close it and Open new App.\n
Your registration has not been approved. Please try loggin in after you got confirmation from us.
You are not authorized to access this service.\nPlease contact your service provider.
ErrorCode: E 024 \nCould not connect with your Network, check your Network settings and try again later.
You do not have sufficient balance \nPlease recharge and try again
Please buy this channel to watch
Please upgrade this channelTemp to watch
Sorry! Server is under Maintenance!!! \nPlease try again later. \nIf this message is continuously seen, Please contact your Service Provider
No Network access or Server Issue \n Please Check your network connectivity \n and contact server administrator
The system detected that the playback has paused for some time. Please OK Button to disable automatic exit and continue.\n Else, the playback will stop shortly.
Please choose any channel to Play! Press Home to exit
Couldnt play the requested channel. Your network issue or it was down from the source itself, Please try again later
An update of this version of App available. Please press OK button in your remote to update your app now.
Sorry, EPG of requested channel is not available
Sorry, DVR of requested channel is not available
AndroidTV LiveTV needs an access to your Extenal Storage.
